info.description: The rendering service provides an engine for generating documents with dynamically injected data.
info.title: Render Service Service API

post.description: Renders the given template with the given data. Returns document id that can be used to get the pdf from Document Service.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: documentRequestV1
parameters.description: Render Request

post.description: Renders the given template with the given data. Returns document id that can be used to get the pdf from Document Service.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: renderRequestV1s
parameters.description: Render Request

post.description: Create the Email Template specified within the body of this request.  The created Email Template will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: emailTemplateV1
parameters.description: Email Template

get.description: Retrieves the email template specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the email template metadata to get

put.description: Update the email template specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated email template will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the email template to replace

parameters.name: newEmailTemplateV1
parameters.description: An email template to replace the existing email template

delete.description: Delete the email template specified by the id provided in the URL.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the email template to delete

post.description: Create the Email signature specified within the body of this request. The created Signature will be returned.

parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.description: A new Email Signature to be created, contains html and inline css

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Signature to get

put.description: Update the Email signature specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated signature will be returned. Deletes signature if empty string provided as content

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Signature to replace

parameters.name: newSignatureV1
parameters.description: A Widget to replace the existing Widget

delete.description: Delete the Signature specified by the id provided in the URL.

parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Signature to delete

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the template to get.

post.description: Create the Template specified within the body of this request.  The created Template will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Template metadata.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Template file.

documentPath.description: Document path to be used. Must specify a file extension

renderRequests.description: The list of requests to be rendered.

id.description: Unique id of the email template

updatedOn.description: When the email template was last modified

createdOn.description: When the email template was created

emailPurpose.description: Enum for the template's email purpose

isVertaforeTemplate.description: Flag for if the email template is a vertafore template

templateName.description: The name of the email template

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

documentSignatureId.description: The ID of the signature (in document-service) to render on the template.

fillData.description: The data to be filled into the template.

signatureFields.description: The list of field names that should have signatures rendered on them.

templateId.description: The ID of the template to be rendered.

updatedOn.description: When the Signature was last modified

content.description: HTML content for email signature, including inline CSS

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
